snippet: In some cities, including Detroit, St, Louis and particularly New Orleans, charter schools enroll a significant proportion of the district’s students.
abstract: Report by National Alliance for Public Schools finds that number of students in charter schools nationwide increased by close to 13 percent between the 2010-11 and 2011-12 school years, to just over two million.
lead_paragraph: In some cities, including Detroit, St, Louis and particularly New Orleans, charter schools enroll a significant proportion of the district’s students.

headline.seo: Charter Schools Growing Fast, New Report Finds
headline.main: Enrollment in Charter Schools Is Increasing
headline.print_headline: Enrollment in Charter Schools Is Increasing
